metadata.title: CVE-2024-46716 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: altera-msgdma: properly free descriptor inmsgdma_free_descriptorRemove list_del call in msgdma_chan_desc_cleanup, this should be the roleof msgdma_free_descriptor. In consequence replace list_add_tail withlist_move_tail in msgdma_free_descriptor.This fixes the path:   msgdma_free_chan_resources -> msgdma_free_descriptors ->   msgdma_free_desc_list -> msgdma_free_descriptorwhich does not correctly free the descriptors as first nodes were notremoved from the list.
